## Projects

<div class="card">
  <h3>Integrated Resource Adequacy Assessment Framework: Theoretical Handbook</h3>

  <p>
    I am the primary researcher preparing a <strong>two-part techno-policy handbook on power sector Resource Adequacy</strong>, covering:
  </p>

  <ul>
    <li>Theory and taxonomy of resource adequacy and its metrics</li>
    <li>Resilience and flexibility requirements</li>
    <li>Integrated Resource Adequacy Assessment (I-RAA) for modern power systems</li>
  </ul>
</div>

<div class="card">
  <h3>Energy Literacy &amp; NLP (Erasmus+ Project)</h3>

  <p>
    Lead researcher on an <strong>Erasmus+ project</strong> studying
    <strong>energy literacy among adolescents</strong> in Europe, using
    <strong>Natural Language Processing (NLP)</strong> to analyse student responses.
  </p>
</div>

<div class="card">
  <h3>Teaching &amp; Guest Lectures</h3>

  <p>
    Guest Lecturer and Teaching Assistant for <strong>"Electricity Sector for Energy Transition"</strong>
    at the <strong>Energy Transition Academy</strong>, delivering sessions on:
  </p>

  <ul>
    <li>Why an integrated framework on resource adequacy is needed</li>
    <li>Modern resource adequacy, resilience, and flexibility metrics</li>
  </ul>
</div>
